Name: Restaurant Bonjour
Review Text: Bistro Bonjour is a good French restaurant in Amsterdam. It is not over the top and yet it is not pretentious either. The menu is predictable but the quality is decent. The quality price ratio is fair  and correct. All dishes were savoury …

Name: Restaurant Bonjour
Review Text:

We started with the French onion soup. The broth had plenty of flavor and the …

Name: Restaurant Bonjour
Review Text: Amazing restaurant with amazing cuisine.  Adding the service, it became "my restaurant".  I highly recommend "Veal Fillet".

Name: Restaurant Bonjour
Review Text: Not a huge fan, but certainly not terrible. Maybe we ordered wrong.

Name: Restaurant Bonjour
Review Text: Fantastic little French bistro - oldest in Amsterdam - just off the main rembrantplein. Amazing food, service and ambience. Worth looking beyond the busy area

Name: Restaurant Bonjour
Review Text: Great location, delicious food and friendly service. Highly recommend!

Name: Restaurant Bonjour
Review Text: Nice staff and well grilled meat. Else, simple and blend. Sauces from a can. French fries not even fresh. This restaurant is so simple that no chef is needed. Just someone to grill the meet. Quite embarrassing restaurant I must say, especially at such a location.

Name: Restaurant Bonjour
Review Text: We went with social deal; I am really surprised from the good reviews received. I am sure that something must have changed because my experience was very bad. Almost nothing from the 4 course menu was good. The lamb ( if it was lamb..)was not edible. The location and space are nice but cannot compensate for the bad quality of food.

Name: Restaurant Bonjour
Review Text: I do not recommend it on the grounds of the service. We went on an unfortunate occasion as there was a table of more than 30 (seemed to be students) being served at the same time as our reservation. Needless to say, service hit rock bottom …

Name: Restaurant Bonjour
Review Text: I've eaten here 4 times. Each time was fantastic. This is one of my favorite spots in Amsterdam. My favorite is the Tornadoes with a Blue Cheese sauce. It's hard to beat that tender steak with it's creamy sauce. The frites are very good and …

Name: Restaurant Bonjour
Review Text:

Name: Restaurant Bonjour
Review Text: Most authentic place in town, great French cuisine for a very Dutch price (that's cheap). Its been here for years and isn't going to disappear any time soon, so long as people keep appreciating the good old fashion family business that have been here for years

Name: Restaurant Bonjour
Review Text: Consistently great food with a lovely terrace on a quiet canal. We dined here a lot during our trip to Amsterdam because we knew we were guaranteed a great meal for a fair price.

Name: Restaurant Bonjour
Review Text: The food was good, but we were there for over 2 1/2 hours for a simple 3 course dinner without any apologies or explanation from the staff.

Name: Restaurant Bonjour
Review Text: A cozy gem on the canals of Amsterdam. The menu and food are good, it’s not five star, but it is certainly good value for money and a quality experience.

Name: Restaurant Bonjour
Review Text: Lovely atmosphere. Very good set menu. A special night to be had. Groups and lovers.

Name: Restaurant Bonjour
Review Text: A little snotty, and the prizes are quite high for the little portions, but you can beautifully sit outside under trees near the Keizersgracht, and the quality of drinks and dishes is superior.

Name: Restaurant Bonjour
Review Text: Small place but good atmosphere, good service and last but not least fantastic food. I would not hesitate to recommend this restaurant to anyone.

Name: Restaurant Bonjour
